abstract: Microsoft has hired Morgan Stanley to sell Razorfish, its digital agency, and French marketing company Publicis Groupe is thought to be a possible bidder, The Financial Times said.
snippet: Microsoft has hired Morgan Stanley to sell Razorfish, its digital agency, and French marketing company Publicis Groupe is thought to be a possible bidder, The Financial Times said.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has hired Morgan Stanley to sell Razorfish, its digital advertising agency, and French marketing company Publicis Groupe is thought to be a possible bidder, The Financial Times said on its Web site late Sunday.

headline.main: Microsoft Said to Prepare for Sale of Razorfish
